misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his seventh appearance in the upcoming edition of the tournament. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami is known for his calm demeanor and calculated approach to the game.

Despite not having yet clinched the coveted Hector Trophée or the individual Victor Trophy, Sami's consistent presence in the tournament speaks volumes about his dedication and passion for the sport. He is admired for his strategic play and unwavering sportsmanship on the course.

Outside of the Hector Trophée, Sami regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour, achieving commendable results and further honing his skills in competitive play. While victory has eluded him thus far in the Hector Trophée, many observers feel that Sami possesses the potential to make a deep run in the tournament.
